column4: Hi folks, I was wondering if anybody knows how to switch to runlevel 3 in 7.04.
telinit 3, but it won't be much use i think, as runlevels aren't very stressed upon in ubuntu really
define "works"... i'm not even really sure the concept of runlevels is present anymore with upstart, except as very basic compatibility with sysvinit
for instance, /etc/inittab is only parsed ("parsed" being too big a word) to check for the default runlevel. but i'm not really sure how much that's actually employed to start or not start things...
